description.translate: Sumptuous, nothing ever made you weaken your power.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Suprême Méloquien\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Somptueux, rien ne te fit jamais\"}","{\"text\":\"§7perdre de ta puissance.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Sumptuous, nothing ever made\"}","{\"text\":\"§7you weaken your power.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a4 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
